values.label: Agreed settlement
values.comment: An adjustment made based on an agreement between partners.

values.label: Below specification goods
values.comment: Goods of inferior quality.

values.label: Damaged goods
values.comment: An adjustment due to the damage of goods.

values.label: Short delivery
values.comment: An adjustment made because the delivered quantity was less than expected.

values.label: Price query
values.comment: An adjustment due to a price query.

values.label: Proof of delivery required
values.comment: The buyer requires that proof of delivery be made before payment.

values.label: Payment on account
values.comment: Buyer is to make payment later.

values.label: Returnable container charge included
values.comment: Adjustment made to deduct the returnable container charge.

values.label: Invoice error
values.comment: Invoice not in accordance with the order.

values.label: Costs for draft
values.comment: Cost of draft has been deducted from payment.

values.label: Bank charges
values.comment: Bank charges have been deducted from payment.

values.label: Agent commission
values.comment: Agent commission has been deducted from payment.

values.label: Counter claim
values.comment: Buyer claims an existing (financial) obligation from seller which (partly) offsets the outstanding invoice(s).

values.label: Wrong delivery
values.comment: Delivery not according to specifications.

values.label: Goods returned to agent
values.comment: Goods returned to agent.

values.label: Goods partly returned
values.comment: Goods partly returned.

values.label: Transport damage
values.comment: Goods damaged in transit.

values.label: Goods on consignment
values.comment: Buyer does not accept invoice(s) charge as it relates to goods where the ownership remains with the seller until sold.

values.label: Trade discount
values.comment: Trade discount deducted from payment.

values.label: Deduction for late delivery
values.comment: Penalty amount deducted for later delivery.

values.label: Advertising costs
values.comment: Advertising costs deducted from payment.

values.label: Customs duties
values.comment: Customs duties deducted from payment.

values.label: Telephone and postal costs
values.comment: Telephone and postal costs deducted from payment.

values.label: Repair costs
values.comment: Repair costs deducted from payment.

values.label: Attorney fees
values.comment: Attorney fees deducted from payment.

values.label: Taxes
values.comment: Taxes deducted from payment.

values.label: Reclaimed deduction
values.comment: Buyer reclaims an unspecified deduction from the invoice(s) (to be) paid.

values.label: See separate advice
values.comment: Buyer or seller refers to separate correspondence about a related shipment(s) and/or invoice(s) and/or a payment(s).

values.label: Buyer refused to take delivery
values.comment: Buyer refused to take delivery.

values.label: Direct payment to seller
values.comment: Buyer states to have paid to seller.

values.label: Buyer disagrees with due date
values.comment: Buyer disagrees with due date.

values.label: Goods not delivered
values.comment: Buyer has not received the goods.

values.label: Late delivery
values.comment: Goods delivered too late.

values.label: Quoted as paid to you
values.comment: Factor informs the seller that a certain invoice(s) was paid by the buyer directly to the seller.

values.label: Goods returned
values.comment: Buyer returned the goods to seller.

values.label: Invoice not received
values.comment: Buyer claims he did not receive the invoice for which payment is requested.

values.label: Credit note to debtor/not to us
values.comment: Factor informs the seller that he did not receive copy of a credit note sent to the buyer.

values.label: Deducted bonus
values.comment: Buyer has/will deduct a bonus he is entitled to from the payment.

values.label: Deducted discount
values.comment: Buyer has/will deduct the discount he is entitled to from the payment.

values.label: Deducted freight costs
values.comment: Buyer has/will deduct freight costs from the payment.

values.label: Deduction against other invoices
values.comment: Deduction against invoices already settled.

values.label: Credit balance(s)
values.comment: Buyer makes use of existing credit balance(s) to offset (partly) the outstanding invoice(s).

values.label: Reason unknown
values.comment: Factor informs the seller that the reason of a commercial dispute raised by the buyer is unknown.

values.label: Awaiting message from seller
values.comment: Buyer or factor are waiting for a (reply) message from the seller before a commercial dispute can be settled.

values.label: Debit note to seller
values.comment: Buyer issued debit note to seller.

values.label: Discount beyond terms
values.comment: Buyer has taken a discount larger than the discount terms agreed with the seller.

values.label: See buyer's letter
values.comment: See correspondence from buyer.

values.label: Allowance/charge error
values.comment: Error made by seller in the amount of allowance/charge.

values.label: Substitute product
values.comment: Product delivered not fully according to specification.

values.label: Terms of sale error
values.comment: Terms of sale not according to purchase order.

values.label: Required data missing
values.comment: A message sent by buyer to seller or by seller to buyer did not contain data required to take action/decision.

values.label: Wrong invoice
values.comment: Invoice issued to wrong party.

values.label: Duplicate invoice
values.comment: Invoice sent twice.

values.label: Weight error
values.comment: Weight not in accordance with the order.

values.label: Additional charge not authorized
values.comment: Additional charge not authorised.

values.label: Incorrect discount
values.comment: Buyer states that calculated discount on the invoice(s) is wrongly calculated.

values.label: Price change
values.comment: Price has been changed.

values.label: Variation
values.comment: The adjustment is a variation from an agreed value.

values.label: Chargeback
values.comment: Balance of one or more items charged back to seller.

values.label: Offset
values.comment: Allocation of one or more debit items to one or more credit items or vice-versa.

values.label: Indirect payment
values.comment: Payment in settlement of an invoice has been made to a party other than the designated creditor.

values.label: Financial reassignment
values.comment: Previously assigned invoice/credit note is being reassigned.

values.label: Reinstatement of chargeback/offset
values.comment: Reversal or cancellation of a chargeback and/or offset relating to an incorrect balance.

values.label: Expecting new terms
values.comment: Buyer expects that seller revises the terms of payment of an invoice.

values.label: Settlement to agent
values.comment: Invoice has been/to be paid to seller's agent.

values.label: Cash discount
values.comment: An adjustment has been made due to the application of a cash discount.

values.label: Delcredere costs
values.comment: Costs deducted from a total amount to pay for the services of central payment.

values.label: Early payment allowance adjustment
values.comment: Adjustment results from the application of an early payment allowance.

values.label: Incorrect due date for monetary amount
values.comment: Adjustment has been made because an incorrect due date was referred to with regard to the monetary amount.

values.label: Wrong monetary amount resulting from incorrect free goods quantity
values.comment: Adjustment has been made because of a wrong monetary amount resulting from an incorrect free goods quantity.

values.label: Rack or shelf replenishment service by a supplier
values.comment: Adjustment due to the replenishment of the racks or shelves by a supplier.

values.label: Temporary special promotion
values.comment: Adjustment due to a temporary special promotion.

values.label: Difference in tax rate
values.comment: Adjustment due to a difference in tax rate.

values.label: Quantity discount
values.comment: Adjustment due to a quantity discount.

values.label: Promotion discount
values.comment: Adjustment due to a promotion discount.

values.label: Cancellation deadline passed
values.comment: The cancellation has occurred after the deadline.

values.label: Pricing discount
values.comment: An adjustment has been made due to the application of a pricing discount.

values.label: Volume discount
values.comment: Discount for reaching or exceeding an agreed accumulated volume.

values.label: Sundry discount
values.comment: Adjustment has been made due to the application of a sundry discount.

values.label: Card holder signature missing
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the card holder not signing the filing document.

values.label: Card expiry date missing
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor not specifying the expiry date within the filing document.

values.label: Card number error
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor specifying an erroneous card number within the filing document.

values.label: Card expired
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor specifying an expired expiry date within the filing document or electronic data.

values.label: Test card transaction
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to a test card transaction, used for installing, maintaining or debugging purposes.

values.label: Permission limit exceeded
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the permission limit defined by card issuer or card company was exceeded without prior authorisation. Synonym: Floor limit.

values.label: Wrong authorisation code
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the authorisation code provided did not fit to the specified transaction.

values.label: Wrong authorised amount
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the specified amount not meeting the authorised amount for the transaction.

values.label: Authorisation failed
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the authorisation needed had failed.

values.label: Card acceptor data error
values.comment: The adjustment was made due to the data regarding the card acceptor is erroneous.

values.label: Treasury management service charge
values.comment: Charge for the service of treasury management.

values.label: Agreed discount
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is that a mutually agreed discount has been applied.

values.label: Expediting fee
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for expediting has been applied.

values.label: Invoicing fee
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for invoicing has been applied.

values.label: Freight charge
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is that freight charges has been applied.

values.label: Small order processing service charge
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for processing of a small order (an order below a defined threshold) has been applied.

values.label: Currency exchange differences
values.comment: An adjustment made due to a change in a currency exchange rate.

values.label: Insolvency
values.comment: An adjustment made due to the partner's inability to pay open debts.

values.label: Incorrect references
values.comment: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect references.

values.label: Incorrect identification of the buyer
values.comment: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect identification of the buyer.

values.label: Incorrect product identification
values.comment: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect product identification.

values.label: New employee
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is a new employee.

values.label: Employee retirement
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is the retirement of an employee.

values.label: Salary change
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is a salary change.

values.label: Parental leave
values.comment: The reason for the adjustment is a parental leave.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
